name: Satyr
summary: The main character (default name Momojirou) is hired for two weeks to help a female gardener named Ayaka to grow flowers for celestial creatures - also female, young, and cute, though with elf-like ears and sometimes even wings. The goal here is to learn enough about different flowers, the ways to make them grow, and the preferences of the girls.
info:
• 别名: サティア
  • 平台: PC98
  • 平台: WIN

  • ブランド: ArPio
